p.p: When using a single SNOMED CT code that describes a type of CDA document then:

li.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Document type subset with subset original id 1061000000133

p.p: When using a compositional expression consisting of multiple codes from SNOMED CT that describes a type of CDA document then:

li.strong: A code from the SNOMED CT UK Correspondence Document type subset with subset original id 44041000000135
A code from the SNOMED CT UK Correspondence CareSetting type subset with subset original id 43971000000130
Further guidance on the format of the compositional expression is available on request.

p.p: A single code from a suitable alternative vocabulary:

li.strong: When using an alternative vocabulary code, then the OID shall contain the OID of the alternative vocabulary
When no ID is available for the alternative vocabulary, then the OID "2.16.840.1.113883.2.1.3.2.4.17.337" shall be used
